name: 纳米Plus_V2_点击切换接口_明月
url:
@js:
eval(String(source.loginUrl)); 
let getTime = (o) => new Date(Date.now()+o*36e5).toISOString().replace('Z',`+${o.toString().padStart(2,'0')}:00`);
let time = getTime(8)
let _e = [
"Web",
time,
"1.2",
"21329384620368073434705174017567",
java.md5Encode(java.getWebViewUA())
]
let et = {
	"User-Agent": java.getWebViewUA(),
	"device-platform": _e[0],
	"timestamp": _e[1],
	"zm-ver": _e[2],
	"access-token": _e[3],
	"zm-token": "",
	"zm-ua": _e[4]
	}
_e[3] || _e.splice(3,1)
et["zm-token"] = java.md5Encode(_e.join(""))
let u = `https://bot.n.cn/api/tts/v1?roleid=${api}`
let body = `text=${speakText}&set_speed=${speakSpeed / 10}&audio_type=mp3&format=stream`
;`${u},{"body":"${body}","headers":${JSON.stringify(et)},"method":"POST"}`
